title: Analysis of Academic Failure Factors and Support Strategies for Pre-Medical Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Medical Education Systems and Adult Learning Theories
context.additional_context: Strengthening competency in designing support systems for medical school students, targeting corporate medical education administrators/leaders

learning_goals: Classify and explain at least three major factors contributing to academic failure among pre-medical students, including personal traits, learning environments, and psychological factors.
Propose at least two strategies to prevent academic failure using active teaching methods applicable in blended learning environments.
Develop personalized support plans for underachieving students based on learning style analysis and motivation enhancement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
